short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShimmySX is an extension for accessing Shimmer enabled distributed applications, or 'Dapps' in your normal Chrome browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ShimmySX browser extension

In the current version NFTs with an IRC27 standard can be viewed by a given Shimmer address.

Shimmer is a scalable and feeless network enabling frictionless decentralized and scalable Web3 economies.

The extension is using the official client library from IOTA (https://github.com/iotaledger) to connect directly to the network, so that dapps can read from the tangle.

In future ShimmySx also lets the user create and manage their own identities or wallets, so when a Dapp wants to perform a transaction and write to the tangle, the user gets a secure interface to review the transaction, before approving or rejecting it.
